amendment.description: To make certain aliens ineligible for adjustment to lawful permanent resident status or Deferred Mandatory Departure status.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4027 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 125.
